commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Rural Network's Assembly#E03277#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3277#Member#C#Leader and Community-Led Local Development#INNOVATION
goals__remit:
The Lithuanian Agriculture Advisory Service (LAAS) was founded in 1993. It is a public institution the mission of which is to help all farming people to develop their businesses profitably without causing damage to environment, produce competitive production, survive and be leaders under the conditions of market economy. 
Organization provide professional agricultural advisory services for farmers and rural entreprenuers in crop production, animal husbandry, economy, work safety, forestry and accounting. Training activities. Innovation partnerships with research and rural busines institutions.
